features: ⚡【Supports High-Speed Charging】Power up your iPhone to 50% in just 30 minutes when you use an 18W or higher Power Delivery USB-C charger,which saves more than 1 hour for you, when compared to the 5W original charger.

⚡【MFi Certified】 Apple MFi Certified USB to Lightning cable, guaranteed no pop-up warnings, these iPhone fast charging cables use advanced C94 Lightning end design for fast charging, which can safely and quickly charge your iPhone device.

⚡【Superior Durability and Strong Quality】High quality TPE material makes this cable more durable and stronger than ordinary iPhone charger cables, while remaining flexible and tangle-free. It is tested for up to 30,000+ bends, making it more durable. Withstand all kinds of daily connection needs and long-term use.

⚡【Wide Compatibility】: MFi certified for flawless compatibility with all Lightning devices, including iPhone, iPad, and more.Works With for iPhone14/13/13 Mini/13 Pro/12/12Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/XS/X/XR/8 Plus/8, iPad Pro/ iPad Air/ iPad, AirPods Pro. Standrad Charging Speed works with iPhone 7/7 Plus/6s/6s Plus/6/6 Plus/SE/5s.

☎【A Cable for Life】We’re so confident in our cables, we are offering a hassle-free replacement for all quality issues. Not for half a year, not for 18 months, but for an entire lifetime. It’s the only cable you will ever need to buy.USB C to Lightning Cable 6 feet long, convenient to charge your device in bedroom, sofa, office, travelling, even if you are in the back seat of the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They work great and are fast chargers. They are long as well not short as the originals. They are durable and great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance and Convenience: The Ideal Charging Solution
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 5-pack iPhone Charger 6FT USB C to Lightning Cable, which has exceeded my expectations. As an Apple product enthusiast, I have been looking for a reliable and fast charging solution for my devices, including the iPhone 14/13/12/12 Pro Max/11/Xs Max/XR/X and my AirPods Pro. This product fits the bill and adds a layer of convenience that is hard to find. Build Quality and Design: Each cable in the pack is sturdily built, reflecting a design prioritizing durability. The 6-foot length is particularly beneficial, offering the perfect balance between convenience and flexibility. I can easily use my phone while charging, whether in bed, at my desk, or lounging on the couch. The sleek design is a bonus, fitting seamlessly with the aesthetics of my Apple devices. MFi Certification - A Mark of Reliability: The Apple MFi certification is a standout feature, ensuring complete compatibility with my Apple devices. This certification gives me peace of mind, knowing I am using a product that meets Apple's quality and performance standards. The charging and data transfer speeds are remarkably consistent, with no error messages or compatibility issues. Fast Charging Capability: The fast charging capability is impressive. I noticed a significant reduction in the time it takes to charge my devices compared to other non-certified chargers. It's beneficial when I need a quick charge before heading out. Durability and Longevity: Durability is a critical factor for me, and these cables don’t disappoint. They have endured daily use without any signs of wear or fraying. The reinforced connectors are sturdy and ensure a secure fit whenever I plug them in. Value for Money: With five cables in one pack, I find it excellent value. I have one in each key location - at home, in the office, and in my travel bag, ensuring I never have a charging option. Overall Impression: This 5-pack iPhone Charger 6FT USB C to Lightning Cable set is a game-changer for anyone in the Apple ecosystem. It offers reliability, fast charging, durability, and great value for money, making it an essential purchase for iPhone and AirPods Pro users. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Swift Charging, Durable Design: The Perfect iPhone Charger
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded to the latest iPhone Charger, and it's been a game-changer for my daily charging routine. This charger impressed me right off the bat with its sleek design and sturdy build. The reinforced cable and robust connectors promise durability, standing out from typical chargers.What sets this charger apart is its lightning-fast charging speed. Equipped with advanced technology, it delivers a rapid and efficient charge without compromising my battery's health. I've noticed a significant reduction in charging time, getting me back to using my iPhone in no time.The 6-foot cable length is another highlight, providing flexibility without compromising on comfort. No more awkward stretching or struggling to use my phone while it's plugged in.Compatibility is a breeze with its MFi certification, ensuring seamless integration with all my Apple devices. From iPhone to iPad to AirPods, this charger delivers a reliable charge every time.Considering its durability, fast charging capabilities, and MFi certification, this charger offers great value for money. It's a smart investment in the longevity of my devices, eliminating worries about subpar chargers damaging my battery or slowing down charging speed.Upgrade your charging experience with this must-have accessory, and say goodbye to charging woes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works super fast
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deal, I love the cords, they are long and super fast charging! My cat messed up my charger so ordered these and received them after 3 hours!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These USB-c charging cords are thicker and sturdier than the last ones I bought. They are long enough to take into the car and reach the back seat. They seem to charge quicker than the last ones I bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast charging in the car or at home
reviews.reviewText: We recently went on a trip where we had a rental car, and had these cables with us, they worked great to charge the phone while we were driving and in the hotel room. If your car or rental car has a USB-C port, these are a great cable to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are amazing!! They are strong and sturdy. I don’t have any issues using them with my iPhone. Such a great deal and the length is perfect. I love that it comes with so many. I keep one in my car and at work. This is too good of a deal to pass up if you have an iphone!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, fast, efficient chargers!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the iPhone fast charger 5 pack, and I must say it's been a game-changer for my charging needs. The fact that these chargers are Apple MFI certified gives me confidence in their compatibility and safety.The charging speed is impressive, delivering a quick and efficient power boost to my iPhone. Having a 5-pack is incredibly convenient – I can keep chargers in different rooms and have spares for travel.The build quality is sturdy, and the cables are durable, which is a relief considering the wear and tear some chargers go through. The length of the cables is just right, providing flexibility without unnecessary clutter.In summary, this pack offers a reliable and efficient charging solution, making it a must-have for anyone who values quality charging accessories.
